components/mobile-filters/mobile-filters:
<section class="mobile-filters">
  {{#if catalog_type.faceted_search_enabled}}
    {{> components/mobile-filters/mobile-filter
      label="faceted_search.mobile.filter_title"
      type="filter"
      title="faceted_search.mobile.filter_title"
      catalog_type=catalog_type
    }}
  {{else}}
    {{#any shop_by_brand.length catalog_type.subcategories}}
      {{> components/mobile-filters/mobile-filter
        label="faceted_search.mobile.browse_title"
        type="browse"
        title="faceted_search.mobile.browse_title"
      }}
    {{/any}}
    {{#if catalog_type.shop_by_price}}
      {{> components/mobile-filters/mobile-filter
        label="faceted_search.mobile.price_label"
        type="price"
        title="faceted_search.mobile.price_title"
      }}
    {{/if}}
  {{/if}}
  {{> components/mobile-filters/mobile-filter
    label="faceted_search.mobile.sort_title"
    type="sortby"
    title="faceted_search.mobile.sort_title"
  }}
</section>
components/common/pagination:
{{#if links.length}}
{{#each links}} {{number}} {{/each}}

components/product-catalog/shop-by-brand:
{{> components/common/facet-toggle title=(lang 'category.shop_by_brand')}} {{#if shop_by_brand.length}}
    {{#each shop_by_brand}}
  • {{name}} {{#if ../arrow}}{{> svg/arrow-right}}{{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{else}} {{lang 'category.no_brands_available'}} {{/if}}
components/mobile-filters/mobile-sort: {{> components/mobile-filters/mobile-sort-item param="featured" label="common.sorter.featured" }} {{> components/mobile-filters/mobile-sort-item param="newest" label="common.sorter.newest" }} {{> components/mobile-filters/mobile-sort-item param="bestselling" label="common.sorter.top_sellers" }} {{> components/mobile-filters/mobile-sort-item param="alphaasc" label="common.sorter.alpha_asc" }} {{> components/mobile-filters/mobile-sort-item param="alphadesc" label="common.sorter.alpha_desc" }} {{> components/mobile-filters/mobile-sort-item param="avgcustomerreview" label="common.sorter.reviews" }} {{> components/mobile-filters/mobile-sort-item param="priceasc" label="common.sorter.price_asc" }} {{> components/mobile-filters/mobile-sort-item param="pricedes" label="common.sorter.price_desc" }}
components/common/compare-checkbox:
<input
  type="checkbox"
  class="input-checkbox sr-only"
  name="products[]"
  value="{{id}}"
  id="compare-{{id}}"
  data-compare-checkbox
  data-compare-id="{{id}}"
  data-compare-title="{{name}}"
  data-compare-url="{{url}}"
  data-compare-price="{{price.without_tax.formatted}}"
  data-compare-thumbnail="{{getImage image 'thumb' (cdn default_image)}}">
components/faceted-search/facets/hierarc:
{{#each items}}
  • {{title}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} ({{count}}) {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
{{#if show_more_toggle}} {{lang 'faceted_search.show_more'}} {{lang 'faceted_search.show_less'}} {{/if}}
components/faceted-search/facets/range: {{#each current_selected_items}} {{/each}}
components/faceted-search/facets/rating: • {{#for 1 4 items}} {{#each this}} {{#if param_value '==' ../$index}} {{/if}} {{/each}} {{#each this}} {{#if param_value '==' ../$index}} {{/if}} {{/each}} {{/for}} {{#each items}} {{#if selected '==' true}} {{lang 'faceted_search.stars' num=param_value}} {{/if}} {{/each}}
